processing_structure.text: Specify input and expected output (one integer input, sum of its divisors)
Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: You already listed the main steps; confirm they match the task: read one integer and produce the sum of its divisors.
Think about what must happen inside the loop: for each candidate number, decide whether it divides the input and then update the running total.
Refine your comments into concrete sub-steps: declare variables, read the integer, loop with an index, check divisibility in the loop and add when true, then print the sum.
